mapper.select: select id , travelid , deid , did , coou , coppt , couage , cocustomer , coframe , copropagand , contrast , card , account , speechcraft , signin , newsletter , train , implement , offer , contract , plan , invitation , reviewed , cureviewed , addtime , adduid , status , summary from tb_travel_data where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_travel_data ( id , travelid , deid , did , coou , coppt , couage , cocustomer , coframe , copropagand , contrast , card , account , speechcraft , signin , newsletter , train , implement , offer , contract , plan , invitation , reviewed , cureviewed , addtime , adduid , status , summary ) values ( #{id}, #{travelid}, #{deid}, #{did}, #{coou}, #{coppt}, #{couage}, #{cocustomer}, #{coframe}, #{copropagand}, #{contrast}, #{card}, #{account}, #{speechcraft}, #{signin}, #{newsletter}, #{train}, #{implement}, #{offer}, #{contract}, #{plan}, #{invitation}, #{reviewed}, #{cureviewed}, #{addtime}, #{adduid}, #{status}, #{summary} )
mapper.delete:
delete from tb_travel_data where id in
#{id}
